name: Night trip
description:
This is my first game ever made,  I hope you will enjoy it!

To quickly retell the story - "you find yourself hungry during the night, and you decide to go grab some cheese at the machine to satisfy your needs" from there you can either find a friend, complete or fail your quest.

If you decide to play it please tell me what I did incorrectly or where I should have added something. 

Thank you and good luck!
